entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 25.
